name: Minimize Facebook
description:
Removes elements I consider clutter on the Facebook interface:
- Trending articles: News feeds from Yahoo
- Ego pane: Ads on the right side
- Entire right pane: Fudge it, get rid of the whole dang thing!

Also adds a cleaner chat interface:
- Larger pictures
- Zooms in on mouse over

Tested on Chrome.  Those colorful profile pics and pixelated picture are just for my privacy.
